title: Aeronautics

general excise tax exemption, see ยง237-24.9. Case Notes Provisions of chapter indicate that for purposes of antitrust actions, department of transportation is, from every aspect, an instrumentality of the State. 553 F. Supp. 976. Does not represent clearly articulated state policy to displace competition with state regulation in the provision of airport taxi services. 562 F. Supp. 712.
